column1: # ARR OMNI-TOOL - ULTIMATE BLACKLIST FOR MEDIA FILE SCRUBBING
# This file contains regex patterns to clean up media filenames before searching.
# One pattern per line. Lines starting with '#' are ignored (comments/disabled).
# - Each line is treated as a regex pattern (case-insensitive)
# - Patterns are applied in order from top to bottom
# - The app will ignore any line starting with a hash
# - Use with caution - test patterns before enabling
# Remove season/episode from start if needed (use carefully - might break TV shows)
# DTS variants (multiple entries for maximum compatibility)
